entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
ISOLATED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT

CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
